dashboardContent.manageAgentsAndClients: Manage your AI agents and clients
dashboardContent.selectAiModel: Select the AI model for this agent
dashboardContent.selectVoice: Select the voice for this agent
dashboardContent.createFirstAgent: Create your first AI agent to get started.
dashboardContent.addFirstClient: Add your first client to get started.

callLogs.title: Call Logs
callLogs.subtitle: View all call history from your agents
callLogs.makeFirstCall: Make your first call from an agent page

settings.title: Settings
settings.slackSubtitle: Receive Slack notifications when support tickets are created, replied to, or updated.
settings.slackWebhookHint: Create an Incoming Webhook in your Slack workspace and paste the URL here.
settings.slackRemoveConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove the Slack webhook?
settings.billingSubtitle: Your current call rates and billing information.
settings.billingInfoDesc: Calls are billed per minute based on your account rates. Contact your administrator to adjust rates.
settings.brandingSubtitle: Customize your platform appearance with your company logo and name.
settings.brandingInheritedAgency: This branding is set by your agency. Contact them to make changes.
settings.brandingOnlyOwners: Only account owners and agencies can customize branding.
settings.logoHelp: Enter a URL to your company logo. Recommended size: 40x40px or larger square image.
settings.calendarSubtitle: Connect your calendar providers to enable booking features in your AI agents.
settings.ghlDesc: Connect your GoHighLevel accounts for calendar booking features.
settings.ghlBearerHelp: Paste your Private Integration Token from GHL Settings > Integrations > Private Integrations.
settings.googleDesc: Connect your Google Calendar to check availability and book appointments.
settings.calendlyDesc: Connect Calendly to use your event types for scheduling.
settings.hubspotDesc: Connect HubSpot meetings for scheduling and booking.
settings.calcomDesc: Connect Cal.com with your API key for scheduling.
settings.calcomHelp: Find your API key at cal.com/settings/developer/api-keys
settings.apiKeysAdminOnly: Only account owners and admin team members can manage API keys.
settings.accountVapiKeysDesc: Configure VAPI keys for this account. These override the global platform keys and are encrypted securely.
settings.platformApiKeysDesc: Global API keys used across all accounts. Only the platform owner can manage these.
settings.apiKeysSubtitle: Configure your platform API keys for VAPI and OpenAI. These keys are encrypted and stored securely.
settings.vapiApiKeyDesc: Used for creating and managing voice AI agents.
settings.vapiPublicKeyDesc: Used for browser-based agent test calls. Find it in your VAPI dashboard under Account > Public Key.
settings.openaiApiKeyDesc: Used for the AI prompt generator feature.
settings.elevenLabsApiKeyDesc: Required for adding custom voices from the ElevenLabs Voice Library. Get your key at elevenlabs.io > Profile + API Key.
settings.addTeamMembersDesc: Add team members to give others access to your account.
settings.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This cannot be undone.
settings.vapiPoolSubtitle: Add VAPI organization key pairs to the pool. Keys are automatically assigned to new accounts and released when accounts are deleted.
settings.vapiPoolEmptyDesc: Add VAPI key pairs to automatically assign them to new accounts.
settings.vapiPoolRemoveConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this key pair from the pool?
settings.vapiPoolCannotRemoveAssigned: Cannot remove a key that is assigned to an account
settings.complianceSubtitle: Manage HIPAA compliance settings, BAA tracking, and audit logs for your account.
settings.hipaaPrivacyRuleDesc: Protects the privacy of individually identifiable health information (PHI). Establishes standards for when and how PHI may be used or disclosed.
settings.hipaaSecurityRuleDesc: Sets national standards for protecting electronic PHI (ePHI). Requires administrative, physical, and technical safeguards.
settings.hipaaBreachNotificationDesc: Requires covered entities to notify affected individuals, HHS, and in some cases the media, following a breach of unsecured PHI.
settings.hipaaEnforcementDesc: Contains provisions relating to compliance and investigations, penalties for violations, and procedures for hearings.

allUsers.title: All Users
allUsers.subtitle: Manage user credits and billing rates for all accounts.
allUsers.onlyOwnersAccess: Only Owners can access user management.

team.title: Team Access
team.subtitle: Create team members who can access your account with different permission levels.
team.adminDesc: Full access to all features including managing agents, clients, and settings.
team.userDesc: Can view and use agents but cannot modify settings or manage team members.
team.addFirstMember: Add team members to give others access to your account.
team.newPasswordLabel: New Password (leave blank to keep current)
team.teamMemberNotice: You are logged in as a team member ({{role}}). Only account owners can manage team access.

twilio.title: Twilio Integration
twilio.subtitle: Connect your Twilio account to import phone numbers for your AI agents. Your credentials are encrypted and stored securely.
twilio.accountSidHelp: Find this in your Twilio Console dashboard
twilio.authTokenHelp: Keep this secret - it will be encrypted before storage
twilio.howToGetCredentials: How to get your Twilio credentials
twilio.step1: Log in to your Twilio Console
twilio.step2: Your Account SID and Auth Token are displayed on the main dashboard
twilio.step3: Click "Show" to reveal your Auth Token, then copy it
twilio.step4: Paste both values in the form above

phoneNumbers.title: Your Phone Numbers
phoneNumbers.subtitle: Manage phone numbers imported from your Twilio account
phoneNumbers.importDescription: Import phone numbers from your Twilio account to use with your AI agents.
phoneNumbers.selectAgent: Select an agent to handle calls for {{number}}
phoneNumbers.noAgentsAvailable: No agents available. Create an agent first.
phoneNumbers.noNumbersFound: No phone numbers found in your Twilio account.
phoneNumbers.setupTwilioDesc: You need to configure your Twilio credentials before you can manage phone numbers.
phoneNumbers.goToTwilioSetup: Go to Twilio Setup in the sidebar to add your credentials.
phoneNumbers.verifyFirstDesc: Please verify your Twilio credentials before managing phone numbers.
phoneNumbers.goVerify: Go to Twilio Setup and click "Verify Credentials".

subAccounts.title: Sub-Account Access
subAccounts.ownerDesc: As an Owner, you can access any agency or client account.
subAccounts.agencyDesc: Access your client accounts to manage their settings and agents.
subAccounts.impersonatingWarning: You are currently viewing as another account. Switch back to access sub-accounts.
subAccounts.onlyOwnersAgencies: Only Owners and Agencies can access sub-accounts.
subAccounts.createClients: Create clients to access their accounts.
subAccounts.noCreatedYet: No agencies or clients have been created yet.

voiceLibrary.title: Voice Library
voiceLibrary.subtitle: Browse and preview voices for your agents
voiceLibrary.addCustomDesc: Paste a Voice ID or ElevenLabs URL. Add details so it shows up like the other voices.

rates.title: Call Rates
rates.subtitle: Configure per-minute billing rates for calls
rates.ownerOnlyNotice: Only the OWNER can modify rates. You can view current rates below.
rates.outboundHelp: Rate charged per minute for outbound calls made by agents
rates.inboundHelp: Rate charged per minute for inbound calls received by agents
rates.billingSyncDesc: Manually sync billing for all completed calls. This will calculate charges based on call duration and deduct from user credits.
rates.billingSyncNote: Billing is also automatically synced when viewing Call Logs.

testCall.title: Test Agent
testCall.startCallPrompt: Start a call to see the transcript

chat.title: AI Assistant
chat.emptyState: Ask me anything about your agents or the platform!

agentEdit.notFoundDesc: This agent doesn't exist or you don't have access to it.
agentEdit.promptPlaceholder: Enter the system prompt for this agent...
agentEdit.firstMessagePlaceholder: Hello! How can I help you today?
agentEdit.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this agent? This action cannot be undone.
agentEdit.startCallPrompt: Start a call to see the transcript
agentEdit.structuredDataDesc: Extract structured data from conversations using a JSON schema.
agentEdit.promptGeneratorDesc: Describe what your agent should do and AI will generate a prompt.
agentEdit.pasteVoiceId: Paste voice ID or ElevenLabs URL
agentEdit.noCallsYet: No calls yet for this agent
agentEdit.addToolsDesc: Add functions, call transfers, or other tools
agentEdit.stopSpeakingDesc: Configure how the assistant detects when the user starts speaking and stops its own speech. This helps create more natural conversations.
agentEdit.startSpeakingDesc: Configure when the assistant starts speaking after the user stops. Adjust timing, smart endpointing, and transcription-based detection for natural turn-taking.
agentEdit.callTimeoutsDesc: Configure maximum call duration and silence timeout. These help prevent runaway calls and wasted credits.
agentEdit.wordsBeforeStop: Words the user must speak before the assistant stops talking
agentEdit.voiceActivityDuration: Duration of voice activity needed to trigger stop
agentEdit.backoffCooldown: Cooldown after assistant stops before it can be interrupted again
agentEdit.waitSecondsDesc: Final delay before the assistant speaks after processing completes (default: 0.4s)
agentEdit.smartEndpointingDesc: Uses AI to predict when users finish speaking. English only.
agentEdit.onPunctuationDesc: Wait time after punctuation is detected (default: 0.1s)
agentEdit.onNoPunctuationDesc: Wait time when no punctuation is present (default: 1.5s)
agentEdit.onNumberDesc: Wait time after numbers are detected (default: 0.5s)
agentEdit.maxCallDurationDesc: Maximum duration before the call is automatically ended
agentEdit.silenceTimeoutDesc: End the call after this many seconds of silence
agentEdit.receivesCallData: Receives call data after each call ends
agentEdit.structuredDataFullDesc: Extract structured information from calls using a JSON schema. VAPI will populate the schema fields based on conversation data.
agentEdit.jsonSchemaPlaceholder: Define the JSON schema for data to extract from the call
agentEdit.extractionInstructionsDesc: Instructions for how to extract data from the conversation

support.title: Support
support.subtitle: Create and track support tickets
support.noTicketsDesc: You haven't created any support tickets yet.
support.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this ticket? This cannot be undone.
